instructions: place the dinner plate in the center of the table cloth
put the salad plate on the center of the dinner plate
put the napkin on the center of the salad plate with the fold on the top
put the wine glass at 2 oclock around the plate
put the water glass to the right and half way below the center of the wine glass
place the dinner fork on the left of the dinner plate with the tines up
place the dinner fork inside the salad fork on the left tines up with the bases at equal height
place the dinner knife on the right side of the plate with the blade edge inward
place the soup spoon on the right of the knife
